Articles.Content:
The Orbital Path Alteration Module is a very simple way to fix your Orbits by adjusting the speed and direction. It has a very low thrust, but is very lightweight and fuel efficient. It works just like a Liquid Engine does, and has its own, smaller, fuel source.

You can use it as a final stage and finally give the Kermen hope of returning after reaching escape velocity, or use several in the last few stages to help aid with Orbit adjusting.

Click here to download.

To install this, simply copy the two folders into KSP/Parts. Enjoy!

Edit: It's been updated to v2.1, it will now overheat if it is used too much, so it can't replace a normal booster.
